Paụnd ahụ bụ ego Federation of Rhodesia na Nyasaland
E kewara ya na iri abụọ shilling 20, nke ọ bụla bụ penny 12.
E hiwere Federation na 1953, ma mepụta ego ọhụrụ ahụ na 1955 iji dochie paụnd Southern Rhodesian bụ nke na-ekesa n'akụkụ niile nke gọọmenti (Southern Rhodesia, Northern Rhodesia, na Nyasaland)
Rhọdesia na paụnd Nyasaland nọchiri paụnd Southern Rhodesian na paụnd wee tụọ ya na nha nhata
Njikọ ahụ kewara na ngwụcha afọ 1963 ma mpaghara atọ ahụ laghachiri n'ịbụ ndị Britain na-achị
Na ọkara nke abụọ nke afọ 1964, Nyasaland nwetara onwe ya dị ka Malawi, Northern Rhodesia nwetara onwe ya dịka Zambia, Southern Rhodesia kwupụtara mgbanwe aha na Rhodesia
Onye ọ bụla wepụtara pound nke ya, dịka pound Rhodesia na Nyasaland
Lee pound Malawian, pound Zambia na pound Rhodesian.
N'afọ 1955, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ nke Mary Gillick nke eze nwanyị na anụmanụ dị iche iche nke Africa na azụ
Okpukpe ndị ahụ sochiri ndị nke sterling, ya bụ ọkara penny na penny, nke nwere oghere n'ime ha, penny atọ (nke a maara dị ka tickeys), penny isii, shillings, otu shilling abụọ na ọkara okpueze

E nwere mbipụta zuru ezu nke mkpụrụ ego ndị a niile na 1956 na 1957, mana mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e mepụtara naanị penny na ọkara penny ruo mgbe ụfọdụ mbipụta ndị ọzọ nke penny isii na 1962 na 1963, na penny atọ na 1963 na 1964
Mkpụrụ ego ndị dị elu, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ihe a na-ahụkarị, na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị na-anakọta ihe n'ihi atụmatụ azụ ha mara mma
E mepụtara mpempe akwụkwọ atọ na ọkara mpempe akwụkwọ na 1964 n'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na Federation kwụsịrị na 31 Disemba 1963.
Site na 1956 ruo 1961, Ụlọ Akụ̀ nke Rhodesia na Nyasaland wepụtara akwụkwọ ozi maka 10/-, £ 1, £ 5 na £ 10.
